scenes.background: Bob rubs his temples and glances at Monica.
scenes.description: Maybe we should just do nothing and skip the celebration.

options.text: Skipping the celebration seems extreme, but maybe we need a break.
options.analysis: You considered the idea but acknowledged the need for rest, showing good empathy and motivation, but lower social skills.

options.text: Doing nothing might save us the hassle, but it could also demotivate the team.
options.analysis: You pointed out the potential downsides of skipping the celebration, showing good perception and balanced emotional control.

options.text: That's not fair to everyone who contributed. We should find a way to celebrate.
options.analysis: You disagreed with skipping the celebration, stressing the importance of recognizing contributions, showing good self-regulation and social skills.
